attributes.action: Ask the people if this is the Brexit they want!
attributes.additional_details: Now that we know that the Brexit people were promised isn't possible - there isn't a net gain in funding for the NHS. Many communities in the most deprived areas of the country will lose out from the loss of EU communities fund, the EU is intent on making an example of the UK by stretch our constitution and making demands on our fishing waters and rule of Gibraltar etc. Both leavers and remained should have the right to tell government if this is what they wanted. We elect MPs on our behalf.
attributes.background: Parliament voted in favour of giving people the right to have a referendum on the future of our relationship with the E.U. The country was divided but ultimately voted in favour of leaving the E.U. Campaign promises by vote leave have not been met and the people know now what they are voting for.
